snippet: Conservatives cautiously welcomed the completion of an interim agreement that would provide Tehran with some relief from Western sanctions.
abstract: Iranian hard-liners cautiously welcome the completion of an interim nuclear agreement that will provide Tehran with some relief from Western economic sanctions in return for a suspension of certain nuclear activities for six months.
lead_paragraph: Conservatives cautiously welcomed the completion of an interim agreement that would provide Tehran with some relief from Western sanctions.

headline.main: Hard-Liners in Iran Offer Mild Praise for Interim Nuclear Agreement
headline.print_headline: Hard-Liners in Iran Offer Mild Praise for Completed Interim Nuclear Agreement
